>> ATTENTION !! Adjustable Leveling has been updated and its skill modifier settings have been reworked:
- General skill user modifiers no longer override each other and instead apply depending on skill user. - Specific skill modifiers are treated as factors further modifying the result. Total skill gain = (skill gain * skill user modifier * specific skill modifier) WARNING: modifiers which are set to 0 will cause the skill not to progress!
>> Check the settings before continuing a campaign!
